Package org.technoready.meliecommerce.service

Class OrderService

java.lang.Object
org.technoready.meliecommerce.service.OrderService
@Service public class OrderService extends Object
Service class that handles business logic for order operations. Manages order creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion with transaction support. DATE: 19 - October - 2025
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jorge Armando Avila Carrillo | NAOID: 3310

      public OrderService()

  • Method Details

    • createOrder

      public Order createOrder(Long userId, List<OrderDetailsDTO> detailsRequest)
      Creates a new order for the specified user with the provided order details. Calculates the total price based on product prices and quantities.
      Parameters:
      userId - Long - The ID of the user creating the order
      detailsRequest - List - Details of products and quantities to order
      Returns:
      Order - The created order entity
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if user or product is not found

    • getAllOrders

      public List<Order> getAllOrders()
      Retrieves all orders from the database.
      Returns:
      List - List of all orders

    • getOrderById

      public Optional<Order> getOrderById(Long id)
      Retrieves a specific order by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - Long - The ID of the order
      Returns:
      Optional - The order if found, empty otherwise

    • getOrdersByUserIdActive

      public List<Order> getOrdersByUserIdActive(Long userId)
      Retrieves all active orders for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - Long - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      List - List of active orders for the user
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if user is not found

    • getOrdersByUserId

      public List<Order> getOrdersByUserId(Long userId)
      Retrieves all orders (active and inactive) for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - Long - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      List - List of all orders for the user
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if user is not found

    • deleteOrder

      public void deleteOrder(Long id)
      Soft deletes an order by deactivating it.
      Parameters:
      id - Long - The ID of the order to delete
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if order is not found

    • getAllActiveOrders

      public List<Order> getAllActiveOrders()
      Retrieves all active orders from the database.
      Returns:
      List - List of active orders

    • updateOrder

      public OrderResponseDTO updateOrder(Long id, List<OrderDetailsDTO> orderDetailsDTO)
      Updates an existing order with new order details. Clears existing details and replaces them with new ones, recalculating the total.
      Parameters:
      id - Long - The ID of the order to update
      orderDetailsDTO - List - New order details
      Returns:
      OrderResponseDTO - The updated order data transfer object
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if order or product is not found
      InactiveResourceException - if the order is inactive

    • validateUserId

      public User validateUserId(Long userId)
      Validates that a user exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - Long - The ID of the user to validate
      Returns:
      User - The validated user entity
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if user is not found
